professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server Management, SQL queries, and report building. Proficient in network infrastructure management, Windows Server, and VOIP services. Skilled in C# programming and deployment of custom software applications with SQL backends. Project management experience with database solutions for AT&T U-Verse.

key_responsibilities: Implemented and managed MS SQL Server 2016
including data migration from previous databases.
Developed and deployed SQL Server reports
Managed SQL Server 2008 R2 data for CRM upgrades.
Created VSDA system for channel creation on AT&T U-Verse.
Managed special event projects like the Masters Golf tournament.
Built and maintained Red Hat Servers
Developed various tools in C++ and PHP.
